text: Overall, it has been a pleasant and wonderful experience. I have a lower back issue, and after undergoing a three-month intensive care program, I definitely feel better than ever. Been going to this woodleigh outlet since July and the service provided by Dr Ryan, Emily and the front desk team has been excellent.  They did quite a detailed posture / spine analysis that was very reasonable. After 3 mths I do feel that my headaches are not as frequent and bad as before. The ringing in my ear has also stopped. Both Ryan and Emily are very experienced and caring. There is even a waiting area for my children to do some colouring while they wait for me.   The front desk team has great customer service too. Highly recommend!

Practitioners: Ryan

I had persistent back pain since Sep 2024 after a small accident while moving bulky items, my mobility worsened and the pain was unbearable at times. I first consulted with Dr. Emily, and gone through adjustment sessions with both Dr. Emily & Dr. Ryan. Committing to regular adjustments made a world of difference! My lower back pain subsided, my posture improved, and I regained (better) mobility. Dr. Ryan also recommended inversion therapy, which worked wonders for lingering soreness. Iâ€™m still going twice a week because the improvements have been incredible. Highly recommend their expertise and care!
